暫且.definition: for now; for the time being; temporarily

暫停.definition: to suspend; time-out (e.g. in sports); stoppage; pause (media player)

暫息.definition: a lull (in the storm); brief break (in rain)

暫時.definition: temporary; provisional; for the time being

暫牙.definition: deciduous tooth; milk tooth; baby tooth; also written 乳齒|乳齿[ru3 chi3]

暫缺.definition: currently in short supply; in deficit (of commodity); currently vacant (position)
